resources.string: Hi Folks! This is basic Shoe Inventory App, which lists out shoes in simple UI.
Clicking \'Next\' provide you some interesting fact about Shoes. Enjoy the experience !
Start navigation to next screen. You\'ll see the list of shoes with default information.\nUse \'+\' sign to add new shoe in the existing list.
The Logout is avaialble in toolbar on ShoeList screen.\nEnjoy the app by maintaining your own list of shoes.
